com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity

Class DestinationsRequestContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity.DestinationsRequestContextListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestContextListener, EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    @WebListener
public class DestinationsRequestContextListener
extends Object
implements RequestContextListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
    Implementation of RequestContextListener that enables the correct use of Destinations when working with non-container managed threads on all supported Cloud platforms.

    • Method Detail

      • getPriority

        public int getPriority()
        Description copied from interface: RequestContextListener
        Returns the priority that defines the order in which listeners are invoked. Smaller priorities are invoked earlier during context initialization and invoked later (reversed initialization order) during context destruction. Negative number should not be used as they are reserved for internal use. If there no requirements with respect to the invocation order, it is suggested to use 0 as default.
        Specified by:
        getPriority in interface RequestContextListener
